LayerPropertiesDialog Class Reference

#include <layprops.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

c_des: Class LayerProperties. c_des: This class is used to show a layerproperties dialog, in which the layernames, layernumber, visibility, select/read, c_des: fillcolour, border, pattern and mapping can be set.
